## Carry Recipe
_Torso Double Hammock – Base Size – 2 Torso Passes + 2 Reinforcing Passes_
- Off center Torso Pass over baby on back
- Spread chest pass with long tail
- Under arm and over baby for another Torso Pass
- Tie half knot in front above chest
- Under arms and bunched reinforcing passes
- TIF
